name: Green Lantern: Rebirth
summary: Written by Geoff Johns Art by Ethan Van Sciver and Prentis Rollins Cover by Ethan Van Sciver The six-issue miniseries that restored Hal Jordan as Earth's Green Lantern now features a new cover by Ethan Van Sciver. This collection also includes the preview story from Wizard Magazine! See how a man born without fear rebuilds his life, putting cosmic forces into motion that will have repercussions on Earth and across the universe. Advance-solicited; on sale October 7 - 160 pg, FC, $14.99 US
info:
